oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate medical discharge, "Form for Retiring a Soldier"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This form belonged to I. W. Payne, who served as a private in Co. H, 1st Regiment of Virginia Infantry. The form was signed by three surgeons (Provisional Army of the Confederate States) at the Chimborazo Hospital. Payne had worked as a farmer and was from Orange County, Virginia. He was 5'7" and had dark eyes and dark hair.
